casebody.data:
PAYSON PAINT & VARNISH CORPORATION, a body corporate, Appellant, v. Philip E. ACKERHALT, Appellee. No. 9934. United States Court of Appeals District of Columbia Circuit. Argued May 16, 1949. Decided May 31, 1949. Mr. Robert I. Rudolph, Washington, D, C, for appellant. Mr. Albert Brick, Washington, D. G, with whom Mr. Everett M. Raff el, Washington, D. C, was on the brief, for appellee.

Before EDGERTON and PROCTOR, Circuit Judges, and II. CHURCH FORD, District Judge sitting by designation.

PER CURIAM.

We find no substantial error in the record. The judgment of the District Court is therefore affirmed.
